LunarPower.NAME: Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Player

lunar:RachisPower.NAME: Power Up
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] deals #b[amt_0] % more damage.

lunar:CripplePower.NAME: Cripple
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name]'s #yArmor is reduced by #b[amt_0] .

lunar:HelfirePower.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] loses #b[amt_0] HP at the end of turn.

lunar:OnFirePower.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] takes #b[amt_0] damage at the end of turn for #b[amt_1] turns.

lunar:TonicPower.NAME: Tonic Buff
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] deals #b175% more damage, restores #b20% lost HP and gains #b35 #yBlock for #b[amt_0] turns.

lunar:TonicDebuffPower.NAME: Tonic Debuff
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] restores #b75% less HP.

lunar:DeathMarkPower.NAME: Death Mark
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] takes #b50% more damage for #b[amt_0] turns.

lunar:ShatteringPower.NAME: Shattering
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack [owner_name] another #b[amt_0] times to #yshatter it.

lunar:ShatteredPower.NAME: Shattered
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name]'s #yArmor is reduced by #b[amt_0] for 3 turns.

lunar:BleedingPower.NAME: Bleeding
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] loses #b[amt_0] HP and #b1 Bleeding after taking damage.

lunar:SlowdownPower.NAME: Slowdown
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] deals #b[amt_0]% less damage and takes #b[amt_1]% more damage for #b[amt_2] turns.

lunar:BlazingPower.NAME: Blazing
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] #ignites the target for #b[amt_0] turns when dealing #yunblocked damage.

lunar:CelestinePower.NAME: Celestine
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] cannot be targeted by cards and applies #b60% #ySlowdown when dealing #yunblocked damage. This removes when taking damage.

lunar:GlacialPower.NAME: Glacial
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever [owner_name] is attacked, applies #b40% #ySlowdown for one turn and deals #b20% damage back to the attacker. This lasts for #b[amt_0] turns.

lunar:MalachitePower.NAME: Malachite
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] disables the healing of the target for #b[amt_0] turns when dealing #yunblocked damage.

lunar:HealingDisabledPower.NAME: Healing Disabled
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] cannot restore HP.

lunar:MirageNewtPower.NAME: Newt's Mirage
DESCRIPTIONS: Newt's confused with your actions.
Newt's cross with you.
Newt's happy to have a battle with you.

lunar:ImmunePower.NAME: Immune
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] takes no damage and immune to ALL negative effects.
This lasts for #b[amt_0] turns.

lunar:ElephantPower.NAME: Jade Elephant
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] gains #b[amt_0] #yArmor .

lunar:MedkitPower.NAME: Healing
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] restores #b[amt_0] HP next turn. This lasts for #b[amt_1] turns.

lunar:SlugPower.NAME: Slug Healing
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] 's regeneration is increased by #b[amt_0] for #b[amt_1] turns.

lunar:PredatoryPower.NAME: Predatory Instinctive
DESCRIPTIONS: [owner_name] 's attack is increased by #b[amt_0] for #b[amt_1] turns.
